body: I am a student in London. I want weather data in London so I can use Ladybug and honeybee test my design. Could you give me some idea? please
topic: How to get more weather Data.

replies.body:
Sam,

Search in the forum. One example is [this](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/faq-where-to-find-epw-weather-data).

-A.
